lead_paragraph: Another former University of Connecticut star has signed to play with the W.B.N.A.’s Connecticut Sun. Svetlana Abrosimova, who helped lead UConn to a national title in 2000, signed a free-agent contract with first-place Connecticut. She joins the former Huskies Barbara Turner, Asjha Jones, Tamika Raymond and Ketia Swanier on the Sun’s roster.
